    Show / Hide Table of Contents

    Class AbstractMonoInstaller

    Base class for any zenject monoInstaller implementation. Consists of "Bind" methods, which are basically instructions about which class should be resolved for each binded contract

    Inheritance
    Object
    AbstractMonoInstaller
    BootstrapInstaller
    GameplaySceneInstaller
    Namespace: Infrastructure
    Assembly: cs.temp.dll.dll
    Syntax
    public abstract class AbstractMonoInstaller : MonoInstaller

    Methods

    BindAbstractClass<TAbstractDependency, TConcrete>()

    Binds non-monobehaviour concrete realization from new instance of given type to given abstract type
